Dataset class¶

class araucaria.main.dataset.Dataset(name=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Dataset storage class.

This class stores a dataset analysis of a Group or Collection.

Parameters

  • name (Optional[str]) – Name for the Dataset. The default is None.

  • kwargs (dict) – Dictionary with content for the Dataset.

Example

>>> from araucaria import Dataset
>>> dataset = Dataset()
>>> type(dataset)
<class 'araucaria.main.dataset.Dataset'>
